game.title: The Seeker's Odyssey
game.description: A captivating quest to unravel, delve into the dungeon and retrieve the ancient artifact with unwavering courage.
game.reward: Rare magical artifact and a fortune in treasure coins

task.objective: Obtain the dungeon entrance key from the Oracle's library
task.description: The oracle advises you to study ancient tomes in her library for a clue. Once you find it, return with the key.
A shadowy figure guards the entrance. Prove your worth by defeating it.
Once inside, journey deeper to face the trials and locate the artifact.
The artifact's resting place will reveal its secrets. Success awaits!
